item.title: Choosing a pushchair...
item.description:
Choosing a pushchair...

The three wheeler pushchair:

Is always a personal choice but it is not always as simple as it sounds. There are a lot of different options to pick between and itâ€™s worth taking some time to make sure you get the right one to suit you and your needs. There are many factors to take into consideration and making the right choice will benefit both you and your child. The colour of the pushchair you select is a personal choice but the type and style of pushchair should be governed by your needs.
